title: Motherland | Gripping Short Film Drama | Post War Conflict | Award Winning!

sources.title: Motherland | Gripping Short Film Drama | Post War Conflict | Award Winning!
sources.description:
Motherland - When a young man from Mali pays an unexpected late night visit to a Bookshop owner in England who used to live in his country, the aftermath of the violent military upheaval and Sharia Law come back to haunt them both.
2016.  Stars: Sope Dirisu, Naomi Ryan, Jason Riddington
